name: psssstrd
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0

stmt.origin: syl2anc(w0, wpss(c0, c1), wpss(c0, c2), wss(c2, c1))
stmt.pretty: syl2anc(w0, c0 ⊊ c1, c0 ⊊ c2, c2 ⊆ c1)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wpss(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wpss(c0, c2))
-| wi(w0, wss(c2, c1))
-| wi(wa(wpss(c0, c2), wss(c2, c1)), wpss(c0, c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wpss(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wpss(c0, c2))
-| wi(w0, wss(c2, c1))
-| wi(wa(wpss(c0, c2), wss(c2, c1)), wpss(c0, c1))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wpss(c0, c2), wss(c2, c1)), wpss(c0, c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wpss(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wpss(c0, c2))
-| wi(w0, wss(c2, c1))

comment: Transitivity involving subclass and proper subclass inclusion. Deduction form of ~ psssstr . (Contributed by David Moews, 1-May-2017.)
